posts.text: 引入header和Footer12include('Menu/header.php');include('Menu/footer.php'); 注册登录系统数据库创建注册表1234567CREATE TABLE `register` ( `userId` int(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '用户id', `userName` varchar(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户名', `passWord` varchar(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户密码', `passWordConfirm` varchar(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '确认密码', PRIMARY KEY (`userId`)) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 数据库连接连接库1$con=new mysqli("localhost","root","","user","3306"); 测试连接123if($getCon->connect_error) { die("连接失败:".$getCon->connect_error);} 解决乱码1mysqli_query($getCon,"set names utf8"); 登录获取表单数据12$userName=$_POST['userName'];$passWord=$_POST['passWord']; 从数据库获取数据数据查询语句12$selData="select userName from $tableNam where userName='$userName' and passWord='$passWord';"; 判断账号密码12345678910111213$que=mysqli_query($getCon,$selData);$res=mysqli_fetch_row($que);if($res){ echo "<script> alert('$userName 登入成功'); self.location='../index.php'; </script>";}else{ echo "<script> alert('账号或密码错误,重新输入'); </script>"; } 注册获取表单数据1$userName=$_POST['userName'];$passWord=$_POST['passWord'];$passWordConfirm=$_POST['passWordConfirm']; 上传数据到数据库数据添加语句1$insertData="insert into register(userName,passWord,passWordConfirm) value('$userName','$passWord','$passWordConfirm');"; 判断用户名占用1$sel="select userName from $tableNam where userName = '$userName';";$que=mysqli_query($getCon,$sel);$pal=mysqli_fetch_row($que);if($pal){ echo "<script> alert('注册失败,用户$userName 已被占用'); </script>";} 执行上传数据库1if($getCon->query($insertData)){ echo "<script> alert('注册成功'); self.location='./login.php'; </script>";}else{ echo "<script>alert('注册失败')</script>";} 选课系统数据库导入数据库1source S:\Wamp\www\xk.sql 连接数据库1$con=new mysqli("localhost","root","","management","3306"); 测试连接1if($getCon->connect_error) { die("连接失败:".$getCon->connect_error);} 解决乱码1mysqli_query($getCon,"set names utf8"); 学生端教师端浏览课程查询语句1$selCourse="select*from course"; 执行语句1$resSel=mysqli_query($getCon,$selCourse); 循环执行1while($row=mysqli_fetch_array($resSel)){ echo" <tr class=\"showCouCen\"> <td>{$row['CouNo']}</td> <td>{$row['CouName']}</td> <td>{$row['Kind']}</td> <td>{$row['Credit']}</td> <td>{$row['Teacher']}</td> <td>{$row['DepartNo']}</td> <td>{$row['SchoolTime']}</td> <td>{$row['LimitNum']}</td> <td>{$row['WillNum']}</td> <td>{$row['ChooseNum']}</td> </tr> "; } 增加课程获取插入数据1$CouNo=$_POST['CouNo'];$CouName==$_POST['CouName'];$Kind=$_POST['Kind'];$Credit=$_POST['Credit'];$Teacher=$_POST['Teacher'];$DepartNo=$_POST['DepartNo'];$SchoolTime=$_POST['SchoolTime'];$LimitNum=$_POST['LimitNum'];$WillNum=$_POST['WillNum'];$ChooseNum=$_POST['ChooseNum']; 插入语句1$insCourse="insert into course(CouNo,CouName,Kind,Credit,Teacher,DepartNo,SchoolTime,LimitNum,WillNum,ChooseNum)value($CouNo,'$CouName','$Kind',$Credit,'$Teacher',$DepartNo,'$SchoolTime',$LimitNum,$WillNum,$ChooseNum)"; 执行语句1if($getCon->query($insCourse)){ echo " <script> alert('插入成功'); self.location='../../teaCon/courseShow.php'; </script> ";}else{ echo " <script> alert('插入失败'); window.history.go(-1);//返回上一级 </script> ";} 修改课程条件查询1$selCourseWhe="select * from course where CouNo = $CouNo"; 获取数据1$CouNo=$_POST['CouNo'];$CouName=$_POST['CouName'];$Kind=$_POST['Kind'];$Credit=$_POST['Credit'];$Teacher=$_POST['Teacher'];$DepartNo=$_POST['DepartNo'];$SchoolTime=$_POST['SchoolTime'];$LimitNum=$_POST['LimitNum'];$WillNum=$_POST['WillNum'];$ChooseNum=$_POST['ChooseNum']; 更新语句1$updCourse="UPDATE course SET CouNo=$CouNo, CouName='$CouName', Kind='$Kind', Credit=$Credit, Teacher='$Teacher', DepartNo=$DepartNo, SchoolTime='$SchoolTime', LimitNum=$LimitNum, WillNum=$WillNum, ChooseNum=$ChooseNumWHERE CouNo=$CouNo;"; 执行语句1if($getCon->query($updCourse)){ echo "<script> alert('修改成功'); self.location='../../teaCon/courseUpdata.php'; </script>";}else{ echo "<script> alert('修改失败'); window.history.go(-1); </script>"; } 删除课程删除语句1$delCourse="DELETE FROM course WHERE CouNo=$CouNo;"; 执行语句1if($getCon->query($delCourse)){ echo "<script> alert('删除成功'); self.location='../../teaCon/courseUpdata.php'; </script>"; } else{ echo "<script> alert('删除失败'); </script>"; } 搜索课程获取条件1$Condition=$_POST['Condition'];$Search=$_POST['Search']; 条件搜索1$selCourse="select*from course where $Condition='$Search'"; 执行语句1$resSel=mysqli_query($getCon,$selCourse); 遍历输出1while($row=mysqli_fetch_array($resSel)){ echo" <tr class=\"showCouCen\"> <td>{$row['CouNo']}</td> <td>{$row['CouName']}</td> <td>{$row['Kind']}</td> <td>{$row['Credit']}</td> <td>{$row['Teacher']}</td> <td>{$row['DepartNo']}</td> <td>{$row['SchoolTime']}</td> <td>{$row['LimitNum']}</td> <td>{$row['WillNum']}</td> <td>{$row['ChooseNum']}</td> </tr> "; }
